translation.en: [announcer] First, an Olympic champion,
translation.zh: 第一名 即奥运冠军… （1976年 蒙特利尔奥运会）

translation.en: Bruce Jenner!
translation.zh: …布鲁斯詹纳！

translation.en: It's all over. It's all over.
translation.zh: 都结束了

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I've always had these issues going through me,
translation.zh: 我一直都在经历这些问题

translation.en: but without them, I don't think I ever would have accomplished what I did.
translation.zh: 但如果没有它们 我不认为自己会达成今日的成就

translation.en: I was just so average.
translation.zh: 我太普通了

translation.en: Well, actually, I was below average.
translation.zh: 好吧 其实甚至还不如普通人

translation.en: I was dyslexic,
translation.zh: 我有阅读障碍

translation.en: and I had identity issues.
translation.zh: 以及身份认同问题

translation.en: But then, in fifth-grade gym class,
translation.zh: 但然后 在五年级的体育课上

translation.en: the coach says, "Run around the chairs," and timed every kid.
translation.zh: 教练说：“绕着椅子跑” 并给每个孩子计时

translation.en: I wound up having the fastest time in the whole school.
translation.zh: 我最终成绩是全校用时最短的

translation.en: My life changed forever at that point.
translation.zh: 那一刻 我的人生彻底改变了

translation.en: If I would have been average,
translation.zh: 如果我是个普通人

translation.en: good student, no identity issues,
translation.zh: 好学生 没有身份认同问题

translation.en: I wouldn't have needed sports.
translation.zh: 我根本就不会需要体育运动

translation.en: But for me, I needed it…
translation.zh: 但对我来说 我需要它…

translation.en: because I was different.
translation.zh: 因为我与众不同

translation.en: Nobody knew it, but down in my soul, I was different.
translation.zh: 没人知道 但内心深处 我是不同的

translation.en: So I built this Bruce character.
translation.zh: 所以我打造了这个布鲁斯的角色

translation.en: [Caitlyn] And Bruce was a good person. Bruce did a lot with his life,
translation.zh: 布鲁斯是个好人 他一生做了很多事

translation.en: and I'm very proud of what he was able to accomplish.
translation.zh: 我为他所取得的成就而感到骄傲

translation.en: Honestly,
translation.zh: 实话说

translation.en: I would kind of like to honor him.
translation.zh: 我有点想向他致敬

translation.en: But, you know what?
translation.zh: 但你知道吗？

translation.en: Caitlyn was always living down deep inside.
translation.zh: 凯特琳一直住在我的内心深处

translation.en: Hey, girl! [whistles]
translation.zh: 嘿 姑娘！

translation.en: Come here. Come here, come here, come here.
translation.zh: 来这里

translation.en: -What are you doing? What? I know. -[dog panting]
translation.zh: 你在做什么？什么？我知道

translation.en: This is a very cute shot we've used.
translation.zh: 这是我们拍的一个很可爱的瞬间

translation.en: We're in Hawaii, and I'm taking Kendall and Kylie,
translation.zh: 我们在夏威夷 我带着肯达尔和凯莉

translation.en: and I'm putting 'em on top in the air like that.
translation.zh: 我把她们像那样举在空中

translation.en: And they thought that was just great fun.
translation.zh: 她们觉得那很有趣

translation.en: Actually, this is kind of interesting.
translation.zh: 这个就有意思了

translation.en: I got a Guinness World Record,
translation.zh: 我有一项吉尼斯世界纪录

translation.en: and it's the fastest time to reach one million followers on Twitter.
translation.zh: 在推特上用时最短突破一百万粉丝

translation.en: I did it in four hours and three minutes.
translation.zh: 我花了4小时3分钟

translation.en: You know who I beat out?
translation.zh: 你知道我打败了谁吗？

translation.en: Barack Obama did it in five… 5.4 or something like that.
translation.zh: 巴拉克奥巴马花了5… 5.4小时还是什么的

translation.en: I beat him out by an hour.
translation.zh: 我比他快了一小时

translation.en: And, actually, here's… I had framed, "Happy Father's Day."
translation.zh: 这里是 我用相框裱起来的 “父亲节快乐”

translation.en: My phone's ringing.
translation.zh: 我的电话响了

translation.en: It's in the other room.
translation.zh: 在另一个房间

translation.en: It's Mom.
translation.zh: 是我妈妈

translation.en: Well, you're being filmed right now.
translation.zh: 你现在被拍下来了

translation.en: I don't need to be filmed, honey.
translation.zh: 我不需要被拍下来 亲爱的

translation.en: I know you don't need to be filmed. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 我知道你不需要被拍 别担心

translation.en: All right, I'll call you in a little bit.
translation.zh: 我一会儿给你回电话

translation.en: -[Esther Jenner] Love you. -Love you. Bye.
translation.zh: -爱你 -爱你 再见

translation.en: [Esther] Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: That's Mom.
translation.zh: 那是我妈妈

translation.en: My mother, 92.
translation.zh: 我妈妈… 已经92岁了 依然精神矍铄

translation.en: And still sharp as a whip.
translation.zh: 已经92岁了 依然精神矍铄

translation.en: But she's actually been a great support to me over the years.
translation.zh: 但她几年来一直是我坚强的后盾

translation.en: Great support,
translation.zh: 对我非常好的支持 因为 你知道的

translation.en: because, you know, I lost my dad way before I transitioned, any of that.
translation.zh: 对我非常好的支持 因为 你知道的 我在变性之前很久就失去了我爸爸

translation.en: That's always been a regret, that my dad didn't know my story.
translation.zh: 那一直令我很后悔 因为爸爸没能知道我的故事

translation.en: I had a good relationship with my dad.
translation.zh: 我和我爸曾经关系很好

translation.en: We were always close because of sports.
translation.zh: 我们因为体育运动而总是亲密无间

translation.en: He loved Bruce. You know, his boy.
translation.zh: 他爱布鲁斯 你知道的 他的儿子

translation.en: Never knowing my whole story.
translation.zh: 他从未知晓我全部的故事

translation.en: When I was ten, eleven,
translation.zh: 当我10岁、11岁的时候

translation.en: I would sneak into my mom's closet.
translation.zh: 我会偷偷溜进我妈的衣橱

translation.en: And if the parents were all gone, I would dress up,
translation.zh: 如果父母不在 我就会打扮起来

translation.en: try things on,
translation.zh: 试穿妈妈的衣服

translation.en: put some lipstick on.
translation.zh: 涂上一些口红

translation.en: Scared to death I would get caught, but I never did.
translation.zh: 十分害怕自己会被抓住 但从未失手

translation.en: It just was so taboo to do.
translation.zh: 这么做是一种大禁忌

translation.en: I always wondered, "Am I doing this for, like, a high?"
translation.zh: 我一直在想： “我这么做是因为刺激吗？”

translation.en: "Is that the excitement? Am I just, like, a risk-taker?"
translation.zh: “这就是兴奋点吗？ 我就像个冒险者吗？”

translation.en: So I've just always dealt with confusion in my soul.
translation.zh: 所以我一直在解答内心的困惑

translation.en: But when sports came around,
translation.zh: 但当体育出现的时候

translation.en: it became that little arena where I could escape.
translation.zh: 它成为了我可以逃避的小竞技场

translation.en: The place where I could shine.
translation.zh: 成为了我能发光的地方

translation.en: When it came to sports, he'd be into basketball.
translation.zh: 提到运动 他对篮球很感兴趣

translation.en: And when basketball was over, he was into track.
translation.zh: 篮球结束后 他又爱上了田径

translation.en: And when track was over, he was into waterskiing.
translation.zh: 再之后 他又喜欢上了滑水

translation.en: So, he was very, very competitive.
translation.zh: 他很争强好胜

translation.en: [Caitlyn] To be honest, because of being dyslexic
translation.zh: 实话说 因为有阅读障碍

translation.en: and not having confidence in myself intellectually,
translation.zh: 以及对自己的智商没有自信

translation.en: I never thought I'd go to college,
translation.zh: 我从未想过自己会上大学

translation.en: but this small school in Lamoni, Iowa, Graceland College,
translation.zh: 但这所位于爱荷华州拉莫尼的小学校 格雷斯兰学院

translation.en: offered me this little deal to play football.
translation.zh: 给我提供了一个 作为橄榄球特长生入读的机会

translation.en: And that's where I met Chrystie.
translation.zh: 我在那里见到了克里斯蒂

translation.en: [Chrystie Scott] I met Bruce the first day of school.
translation.zh: 我上学第一天就遇到布鲁斯了

translation.en: This person just came running up to me that I'd never met
translation.zh: 这个我从未见过的人 就这么冲我跑过来…

translation.en: and said, "Will you go to the movie with me Friday night?"
translation.zh: （克里斯蒂斯科特） …说：“你愿意周五晚上 和我去看电影吗？”

translation.en: And I…
translation.zh: 然后我说…

translation.en: "Okay."
translation.zh: “好啊”

translation.en: And then he ran away.
translation.zh: 然后他就跑了

translation.en: He was really funny,
translation.zh: 他很风趣

translation.en: and he didn't know how handsome he was.
translation.zh: 还没有意识到自己有多帅

translation.en: He was just the boy next door.
translation.zh: 他就像是邻家男孩一样

translation.en: I remember we were talking about gymnastics…
translation.zh: 我记得我们聊到体操…

translation.en: and he said, "Oh, I love gymnastics."
translation.zh: 他说：“哦 我喜欢体操”

translation.en: And then he did handsprings and backflips across the lawn,
translation.zh: 然后他在草坪上做了手翻和后空翻

translation.en: like, he was just gone.
translation.zh: 一下子翻出去很远

translation.en: It was so surprising and so impressive,
translation.zh: 这真的令人惊讶又惊艳

translation.en: and I was just learning how he could do anything.
translation.zh: 然后我知道了 他什么都能做成

translation.en: He could just do anything.
translation.zh: 他做什么都可以

translation.en: [Caitlyn] January 2nd, 1969.
I was playing linebacker to try to block a punt.
translation.zh: 我当时打中后卫 试图阻挡一次短传

translation.en: I got through the line. [rocket sound] Gone.
translation.zh: 我飞快地跑过防线

translation.en: Just getting ready to jump,
translation.zh: 正准备跳起来的时候

translation.en: and the single safety hit me right in my knee
translation.zh: 对方的安全卫击中了我的膝盖

translation.en: when it was planted firmly in the ground.
translation.zh: 我的膝盖重重地摔在了地上

translation.en: Bang. Tore it up.
translation.zh: “砰”一声 撕裂了

translation.en: And I thought, "That's the end of sports. I'm done with that."
translation.zh: 我想：“这就是运动生涯的终点了 我不可能再搞体育了”

translation.en: "I don't think my knee's gonna make it through that."
translation.zh: “我觉得我的膝盖撑不下去了”

translation.en: And I remember seeing him walk around with a cast on his leg,
translation.zh: 我记得看着他腿上打着石膏四处走动

translation.en: and he would sit around and sulk.
translation.zh: 然后他会坐在那里生闷气

translation.en: Moody. It was a horrible time for him when he was injured.
translation.zh: 心情郁闷 他受伤的那段时间是一段黑暗的时光

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I didn't know what I was gonna do. I didn't know if my knee would come back.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己之后要什么 不知道自己的膝盖会不会好

translation.en: I didn't think I would make it through that,
translation.zh: 我没想到自己能挺过去

translation.en: and I didn't know what my future was.
translation.zh: 也不知道自己的未来会是什么样子

translation.en: [Chrystie] But LD Weldon, the track-and-field coach,
translation.zh: （L.D.韦登） 但田径教练L.D.韦登

translation.en: got his hands on him and said,
translation.zh: 握着他的手说：

translation.en: "I think you'd be better at the decathlon,"
translation.zh: “我觉得你参加十项全能会更好”

translation.en: and the rest is history.
translation.zh: 接下来的事情就人尽皆知了

translation.en: [LD Weldon] I was really impressed with Bruce because he'd listen to you
translation.zh: 我对布鲁斯印象很深刻 因为他会听你的话

translation.en: and he had a desire to just do the very best he could possibly do.
translation.zh: 他也有想尽力而为的愿望

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I had no idea what I was getting into,
translation.zh: 我完全不知道自己要面对的是什么

translation.en: but my sophomore year, I ran my first decathlon.
translation.zh: 但大二的时候 我第一次参加了十项全能比赛

translation.en: That one race,
translation.zh: （詹纳眺望未来） 那场比赛

translation.en: that changed everything.
translation.zh: 改变了一切

translation.en: One race.
translation.zh: 就这么一场比赛

translation.en: I remember walking up to the line,
translation.zh: 我记得走上起跑线

translation.en: and the adrenal glands just hit.
translation.zh: 然后肾上腺素就开始大量分泌

translation.en: -[echoing] Bam! -[starting pistol fires]
translation.zh: 砰！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] My heartbeat went from 80 to 180, just like that.
translation.zh: 我的心跳就那样从80到了180

translation.en: And I'm thinking,
translation.zh: 我心想：

translation.en: "If there was ever an event that's got my name on it, this is it."
translation.zh: “如果我能在某项运动中载入史册 那就是这项了”

translation.en: It just intrigued me. The history behind it intrigued me.
translation.zh: 它引起了我的兴趣 背后的历史让我很感兴趣

translation.en: 1912, the winner of the first decathlon was Jim Thorpe.
translation.zh: 1912年 第一届十项全能的冠军是吉姆索普

translation.en: And the king of Sweden said to Jim,
translation.zh: 瑞典国王对吉姆说：

translation.en: "You are truly the greatest athlete in the world."
translation.zh: “你是世界上最伟大的运动员”

translation.en: So they give you that title.
translation.zh: 他们会给你那样的称号

translation.en: And that was pretty much my obsession from that point on.
translation.zh: 从那时起 这就成了我所痴迷的东西

translation.en: That year, I actually broke the school record for the decathlon at Graceland.
translation.zh: 那一年 我打破了格雷斯兰十项全能的校记录

translation.en: And then my senior year, in 1972, I made it on my first Olympic team.
translation.zh: 然后大四的时候 1972年 我第一次进入奥运代表队

translation.en: I was a nobody.
translation.zh: 我当时是个无名小卒

translation.en: I never should have made it on the team, but I did.
translation.zh: 我本不可能加入国家队 但我入选了

translation.en: It was by far the biggest athletic thrill of my life.
translation.zh: 这是迄今为止 我人生中最令我兴奋的赛事

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The decathlon is ten events.
translation.zh: 十项全能包含十个项目

translation.en: There are five events the first day, five events the second day.
translation.zh: 第一天有五项 第二天是另外五项

translation.en: But each event contradicts the next.
translation.zh: 每个项目都相互矛盾

translation.en: Shot put, you can get bigger and stronger and throw the shot farther.
translation.zh: 铅球 你可以训练得体格更大更强壮 从而投出更远距离

translation.en: But the next event's the high jump. You can't get off the ground.
translation.zh: 但接下来的项目是跳高 你就跳不起来了

translation.en: Where is that balance?
translation.zh: 如何平衡？

translation.en: Not only physically,
translation.zh: 不只是身体上

translation.en: but mentally.
translation.zh: 还有精神上

translation.en: The competition is so intense.
translation.zh: 比赛太激烈了

translation.en: Nobody ever beats the decathlon.
translation.zh: 没人能战胜十项全能

translation.en: I didn't have a chance.
translation.zh: 我当时毫无竞争力

translation.en: I got tenth.
translation.zh: 拿到了第十名

translation.en: [Caitlyn] But then the most significant thing happened after.
translation.zh: 但后来 最重要的事情发生了

translation.en: I wanted to stay around to watch the ceremony.
translation.zh: 我想留下来看仪式

translation.en: I'd never seen an Olympic gold medal ceremony happening right in front of me.
translation.zh: 因为我从未亲眼见证过 奥运会的颁奖仪式

translation.en: I stood up on the side,
translation.zh: 我站在旁边看

translation.en: and I watched this guy, Nikolai Avilov of the Soviet Union,
translation.zh: 我看到这个人 来自苏联的尼古拉阿维洛夫

translation.en: and I was totally impressed with this human being.
translation.zh: 我完全为这个人所折服

translation.en: He had just won the decathlon.
translation.zh: 他刚刚赢得了十项全能比赛

translation.en: And watched him receive his medal.
translation.zh: 看着他拿到奖牌

translation.en: I said to myself,
translation.zh: 我对自己说：

translation.en: "That's it."
translation.zh: “就是这样

translation.en: "That's what I want right there."
translation.zh: 这就是我想要的”

translation.en: After he came home,
translation.zh: 回到家之后

translation.en: Bruce talked about Avilov a lot.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯经常提到阿维洛夫

translation.en: I remember Bruce talking about Avilov as godlike.
translation.zh: 我记得布鲁斯说阿维洛夫就像神一样

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Avilov was a very gifted athlete.
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫是个很有天赋的运动员

translation.en: [Caitlyn] And he had such a big impact on my life.
translation.zh: 他对我的人生影响很大

translation.en: He had good skills.
translation.zh: 他技术很好

translation.en: He was talented. He obviously worked hard.
translation.zh: 天资过人 当然也刻苦勤奋

translation.en: But mentally, he was extraordinarily strong.
translation.zh: 但在精神上 他异常强大

translation.en: He had everything.
translation.zh: 他拥有一切

translation.en: He was from the Soviet Union in the middle of the Cold War.
translation.zh: 他来自冷战时期的苏联

translation.en: The Soviet Union would have athletic camps for young kids
translation.zh: 苏联会为年幼的孩子设置运动营

translation.en: where they're trained, and they're worked, and they're put into sports schools,
translation.zh: 孩子们在那里训练、劳动 然后被送去体育学校

translation.en: and they're gonna cultivate these great athletes.
translation.zh: 他们会培养这些优秀的运动员

translation.en: That was Avilov.
translation.zh: 那就是阿维洛夫

translation.en: And I always thought,
translation.zh: 我一直在想：

translation.en: "They never would have picked me to be on one of those teams."
translation.zh: “他们永远不会把我选入那种队伍”

translation.en: I had this war going on inside me.
translation.zh: 我内心深处有一场斗争

translation.en: "Are you really trans? Are you gay?"
translation.zh: “你真的是跨性别吗？” “你是同性恋吗？”

translation.en: I didn't know anything about that, so you just keep your mouth shut.
translation.zh: 我什么都不知道 那就沉默吧

translation.en: But I thought, "What if I take the next four years of my life
translation.zh: 但我心想：“如果我在未来四年里

translation.en: and every minute of every day,
translation.zh: 每一分每一秒

translation.en: I test myself to see how good I could become at something?"
translation.zh: 都挑战自己 看自己究竟能达成什么成就呢？”

translation.en: An opportunity to prove myself, prove my masculinity,
translation.zh: 一个证明自己 证明男子气概的机会

translation.en: prove myself to the world that I'm a worthwhile human being.
translation.zh: 向全世界证明自己是个不凡的人

translation.en: If I can win an Olympic gold medal,
translation.zh: 如果我能赢得奥运会金牌

translation.en: maybe I can prove these issues don't even exist.
translation.zh: 也许我就能证明这些问题都不存在

translation.en: [Chrystie] I never understood why it was that important.
translation.zh: 我从来都不懂为什么那这么重要

translation.en: But I did know that he was struggling with this dissatisfaction within himself.
translation.zh: 但我知道他在因对自己的不满而挣扎

translation.en: So we got married,
translation.zh: 所以当我们结婚后

translation.en: and I told him, "I can support you,
translation.zh: 我告诉他： “我可以支持你

translation.en: and I can help you get to those track meets,
translation.zh: 可以带你去参加那些田径比赛

translation.en: and, you know, let's do this."
translation.zh: 你懂的 咱们就这么做”

translation.en: I got a transfer to San Jose, and we moved in spring of '73.
translation.zh: 我被调到圣何塞 然后我们在1973年春天搬家

translation.en: I found this apartment next to San Jose City College,
translation.zh: 我在圣何塞城市学院旁边 找到了这个公寓

translation.en: and then the one that was in the back, overlooking the track,
translation.zh: 公寓背面的一间房可以俯瞰跑道

translation.en: I said, "This has gotta be the one."
translation.zh: 我说：“就是这间了”

translation.en: Wanna go for a run, Berth? Come on, let's go.
translation.zh: 想去跑步吗 泊斯？来吧 我们走

translation.en: See you in an hour, Bruce.
translation.zh: 一小时后见 布鲁斯

translation.en: My life back between 1972 and 1976,
translation.zh: 我在1972年和1976年之间的人生

translation.en: very simple.
translation.zh: 非常简单

translation.en: I got up and I trained.
translation.zh: 起床 然后训练

translation.en: Chrystie and I were living in this little one-bedroom apartment,
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂和我住在这间一居室公寓里

translation.en: and we thought we'd love to have a little dog.
translation.zh: 想着我们可以养条狗

translation.en: I saw in the paper that there was, like, ten puppies,
translation.zh: 我在报纸上看到有十只小狗

translation.en: and she was the one that was on the outside.
translation.zh: 她就是在外面的那一只

translation.en: And Bertha became my best friend.
translation.zh: 泊莎成了我最好的朋友

translation.en: Went to every workout,
translation.zh: 陪我参加每次训练

translation.en: and I dug a hole so she could go under the fence.
translation.zh: 我挖了个洞 好让她从围栏下面进来

translation.en: Come on, Berth!
translation.zh: 来吧 泊斯

translation.en: Trained six to eight hours a day, every day, 365 days out of the year.
translation.zh: 每天训练6到8小时 一年365天如此

translation.en: Just get it in, get it in, get it in, get it in.
translation.zh: 一直训练

translation.en: I didn't have a coach. I had to do all my training on my own,
translation.zh: 我没有教练 所有的训练都靠自己 所以就只有我们两人

translation.en: so it was just us.
translation.zh: 所有的训练都靠自己 所以就只有我们两人

translation.en: 15.1, Bruce. Not too bad!
translation.zh: 15.1秒 布鲁斯 不赖！

translation.en: Snap it up next time.
translation.zh: 下次再快一点

translation.en: [Caitlyn] This was in the '70s.
translation.zh: 当时是70年代

translation.en: You couldn't make any money in the sport. The last year of the amateur athlete.
translation.zh: 业余运动员的最后一年 你无法从这项运动中赚钱

translation.en: So I got a job part-time as an insurance agent,
translation.zh: 所以我找了一份 保险代理人的兼职工作

translation.en: and Chrystie was a flight attendant.
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂则去做了空乘

translation.en: So between the two of us, we could make ends meet.
translation.zh: 我们两个人的工资可以勉强过活

translation.en: And then on the weekends,
translation.zh: 在周末

translation.en: I was competing in track meets all over the world.
translation.zh: 我参加了全世界各地的田径比赛

translation.en: At night, I'd dream about the Games, I'd dream about the technique.
translation.zh: 在晚上我会梦到比赛 梦到那些技巧

translation.en: I was obsessed with getting the most out of myself.
translation.zh: 我痴迷于发挥自己最大的潜能

translation.en: [commentator] On the left of your screen is Bruce Jenner.
translation.zh: 画面左侧是布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: -This is not a great event for Bruce. -[starting pistol fires]
translation.zh: 这场比赛不是布鲁斯的强项

translation.en: -[commentator] Mirabeau… -[Caitlyn] I'm not a great sprinter,
translation.zh: 我不是个优秀的短跑选手

translation.en: so the 100 meters was always a challenge.
translation.zh: 所以100米一直是个挑战

translation.en: [commentator] …but to keep pushing to get that time.
translation.zh: 但他在努力冲刺取得成绩

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I was frustrated
translation.zh: 我很沮丧

translation.en: because I needed to get better.
translation.zh: 因为我需要变得更好

translation.en: [Chrystie] He was an incredible athlete,
translation.zh: 他是个不可思议的运动员

translation.en: but it just seemed like he was always struggling with his form on the hurdles.
translation.zh: 但感觉他总是纠结自己过栏时的姿态

translation.en: Come on, Bruce!
translation.zh: 加油 布鲁斯！

translation.en: Bruce really needed somebody he could train with.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯真的需要个可以陪他训练的人

translation.en: This is one.
translation.zh: （文斯史崔克）

translation.en: This is a picture taken at City College, and this is Bruce, back…
translation.zh: 这是在城市学院拍的照片 这是布鲁斯

translation.en: This was back in our training days.
translation.zh: 是在我们训练的时候拍的

translation.en: We were pretty buffed out back then.
translation.zh: 我们过去身材都很壮实

translation.en: Bruce hanging on my arm.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯挂在我的胳膊上

translation.en: I had read an article where Bruce Jenner had just won an all-comers meet,
translation.zh: 我看到一篇文章 布鲁斯詹纳刚赢得了一次全员比赛

translation.en: and here's a picture of this great-looking guy running,
translation.zh: 还配有一张帅哥跑步的照片

translation.en: and I'm thinking, "Yeah, I'm gonna go to San Jose."
translation.zh: 我心想：“没错 我要去圣何塞”

translation.en: I go into the YMCA, and lo and behold, there's Bruce.
translation.zh: 我去了一个基督青年教会 然后果不其然 布鲁斯在那里

translation.en: He's doing a weight workout.
translation.zh: 他在做力量训练

translation.en: Walks up to me and basically says, "Hey, I wanna train for the decathlon."
translation.zh: 他走到我面前说： “嘿 我想训练十项全能”

translation.en: And I went, "Okay. Follow."
translation.zh: 然后我说：“好吧 跟上”

translation.en: [Stryker] We'd started running together, going to the track together.
translation.zh: 我们开始一起跑步 一起去田径场 一起举重

translation.en: We started lifting together.
translation.zh: 一起举重

translation.en: The hardest part about this is trying to get the weight up on top of you, okay?
translation.zh: 最难的部分是把这些举过头顶

translation.en: Put 'em on your knees, and then lean back and kick one leg and the other leg, right?
translation.zh: 把它们放在膝盖上 然后往后靠 然后踢一条腿 再另一条腿 好吗？ 有点像是一个接着…

translation.en: Sort of one right behind each other and get it up. Okay. [grunts]
translation.zh: 然后踢一条腿 再另一条腿 好吗？ 有点像是一个接着…

translation.en: [Vince] When we trained, he'd talk about Nikolai Avilov.
translation.zh: 我们训练的时候 他会谈到尼古拉阿维洛夫

translation.en: Bruce always said, "This is the guy I'm gonna have to beat to win."
translation.zh: 布鲁斯总是说： “我要获胜就需要打败这个人”

translation.en: He wanted to break his world record.
translation.zh: 他想要打破他的世界纪录

translation.en: So we would do clean and jerks.
translation.zh: 于是我们会做挺举

translation.en: This is not just lifting weights. This is an athletic move.
translation.zh: 这不只是举重那么简单 这是专业的运动员动作

translation.en: We got that up to over 300 pounds.
translation.zh: 我们把重量提高到超过136公斤

translation.en: Even after the weights, we'd go back out and run again.
translation.zh: 即使在举重之后 我们还是会再出去跑步

translation.en: He would talk about running that 1500 meters
translation.zh: 他会提到跑1500米

translation.en: and running Avilov down at the end.
translation.zh: 并在终点前超过阿维洛夫

translation.en: Every day, he seemed to get faster,
translation.zh: 每一天 他都会变得更快

translation.en: more powerful.
translation.zh: 更强

translation.en: He started to gain his momentum and winning competitions.
translation.zh: 他开始显露头角 并赢得比赛

translation.en: [commentator] There you see Bruce Jenner, shows tremendous speed. There he goes.
translation.zh: 现在你看到的是布鲁斯詹纳 速度飞快 他来了

translation.en: -And that's a good jump. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 跳得很好

translation.en: [commentator] You can hear the grunt.
translation.zh: 你能听到他的哼声

translation.en: I always felt mentally weaker than everybody else.
translation.zh: 我总是觉得自己在精神上比常人脆弱

translation.en: That became my greatest asset.
translation.zh: 那成了我最大的财富

translation.en: I was a lot more dedicated.
translation.zh: 我更专注

translation.en: I was a lot more intense about it.
translation.zh: 也更加重视了

translation.en: I wasn't told to do this. I wasn't brought up to do this.
translation.zh: 我没被要求这么做 也不是从小就开始训练

translation.en: It was me. I wanna be better than everybody else,
translation.zh: 就只有我而已 我想比他人更优秀

translation.en: I wanna train harder than everybody else,
translation.zh: 我想比其他人更努力训练

translation.en: because I needed that in my life.
translation.zh: 因为我的人生需要它

translation.en: The year before the Olympics, people started recognizing Bruce.
translation.zh: 奥运会前一年 人们开始认识布鲁斯

translation.en: [commentator] Bruce Jenner of San Jose, California.
translation.zh: 来自加州圣何塞的布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: He's out to better his record at the Summer Olympic Games in Montreal.
translation.zh: 他打算在蒙特利尔夏季奥运会上 取得更好的成绩

translation.en: They knew that he was a favorite to compete against Avilov.
translation.zh: 他们知道他是与阿维洛夫 竞争的热门人选

translation.en: The pressure was really on then.
translation.zh: 当时压力真的很大

translation.en: Next year is a biggie, right?
translation.zh: 明年很重要 对吧？

translation.en: -Ooh, you can say that again. -Are we gonna get it?
translation.zh: -你可以再说一遍吗？ -我们能获胜吗？

translation.en: I feel confident that Freddy and myself are gonna be right in there.
translation.zh: 我有信心弗雷迪和我都能入围

translation.en: I see the top three right now, Fred, myself, and Avilov.
translation.zh: 我现在就能预见前三名 弗雷迪、我和阿维洛夫

translation.en: -[interviewer] Next year for the Olympics? -Well, it's 11 months from right now.
translation.zh: -明年的奥运会准备如何？ -现在距离比赛11个月

translation.en: The chances… I have just as good a chance as anybody, and probably better than most, to win it.
translation.zh: 我和其他人一样 且可能比大多数人更有机会赢得比赛

translation.en: Hopefully, we'll be up there. We'll be competitive, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 希望我们会站上领奖台 我们一定会竞争激烈的

translation.en: The only way I can compete and to win is to put everything into it.
translation.zh: 我唯一能去竞争并获胜的方式 就是全力以赴

translation.en: Right now, my attitude is the Olympic Games.
translation.zh: 现在 我的态度就是奥运会

translation.en: I'm gonna sacrifice anything I have to do.
translation.zh: 我会为此牺牲必要的一切 （詹纳想要的奖牌——金牌）

translation.en: [commentator] In the 1500 meters now. Jenner is running for the title.
translation.zh: 正在进行的1500米 詹纳在向冠军位发起冲刺 （泛美运动会 墨西哥城）

translation.en: Jenner.
translation.zh: 詹纳

translation.en: All of a sudden, Jenner now gets a challenge.
translation.zh: 突然 詹纳现在面临一个挑战

translation.en: This will help Jenner
translation.zh: 这会帮助詹纳

translation.en: because it will ensure the fact that that seven seconds is gonna be there.
translation.zh: 因为这会确保七秒钟后 就是决定胜负的时刻

translation.en: Jenner now fighting desperately
translation.zh: 詹纳现在在拼命追赶

translation.en: because he doesn't like to lose to anybody,
translation.zh: 因为他不喜欢输给任何人

translation.en: especially Tito from Argentina.
translation.zh: 尤其是输给来自阿根廷的蒂托

translation.en: There we go. On past…
translation.zh: 好了 越线…

translation.en: [stammering] But it's unreal for me to experience this,
translation.zh: 对我来说经历这一切很不真实

translation.en: and so, I-I just couldn't be more happy and more excited.
translation.zh: 所以我无法更高兴和兴奋了

translation.en: [interviewer] How much does it mean to you
translation.zh: 让你的孩子们看到

translation.en: for your children to see their dad win a major championship?
translation.zh: 他们的爸爸赢得锦标赛冠军 对你来说意味着什么？

translation.en: [Tiger] It's special just to have them here. Luckily, I was able to win.
translation.zh: 他们在这里就已经很特别了 幸好我赢了

translation.en: [interviewer] Thank you for that, and what a great champion.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你 多么伟大的一个冠军

translation.en: Around here, that will never be…
translation.zh: 在这里 这永远不会…

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Good for him.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮

translation.en: You know, watching Tiger win,
translation.zh: 看着泰格获胜

translation.en: I mean, I appreciate the work that goes into it.
translation.zh: 我是说 我欣赏他付出的努力

translation.en: You know, everybody has to overcome obstacles in life.
translation.zh: 每个人都必须克服生活中的阻碍

translation.en: Everybody's got stuff in their life that they have to deal with.
translation.zh: 每个人的生活中 都有他们必须面对的事情

translation.en: And over the last, you know, 11 years, he's been through a lot.
translation.zh: 在过去的11年间 他经历了很多

translation.en: Physical, emotional,
translation.zh: 身体上 心灵上

translation.en: scandals, you name it.
translation.zh: 丑闻 你能想到的一切

translation.en: Embarrassment.
translation.zh: 窘迫

translation.en: But he overcame that. I mean, one regret I have,
translation.zh: 但他克服了那些 我一直有的遗憾

translation.en: that my kids, who are the closest in my life right now, weren't there when I was competing.
translation.zh: 就是现在和我最亲密的孩子们 没能在我比赛的时候陪伴我

translation.en: [Gerald Ford] Ladies and gentlemen of the Plattsburgh area,
translation.zh: 普拉茨堡地区的女士们、先生们

translation.en: let me say that
translation.zh: 有机会来到普拉茨堡…

translation.en: it's really a great privilege and a very high honor
translation.zh: （杰拉尔德福特总统） …是一种

translation.en: to have the opportunity to be here in Plattsburgh.
translation.zh: 莫大的荣幸和崇高的荣誉

translation.en: Let me congratulate all of you
translation.zh: 让我祝贺你们所有人

translation.en: for the accomplishment of making the American Olympic team in 1976.
translation.zh: 在1976年加入美国奥运代表队 所取得的成就

translation.en: And on behalf of all Americans,
translation.zh: 我代表所有美国人

translation.en: good luck and God bless you.
translation.zh: 祝你们好运 上帝保佑你们

translation.en: -Bruce, would you sign this picture? -Sure. Sure.
translation.zh: -布鲁斯 你能签个名吗？ -当然

translation.en: I'll be around for the next few days, so we can get as many as you want.
translation.zh: 接下来几天我都会在 所以你想要多少签名都可以

translation.en: -That one's there right there. All right. -[woman] Thank you!
translation.zh: -这个签好了 好了 -谢谢你！

translation.en: You're so nice!
translation.zh: 你真好！

translation.en: How's that? There you go. All right? Good enough.
translation.zh: 怎么样？给你 好吗？挺好的

translation.en: -[child] One more! -[child 2] Thank you!
translation.zh: -再签一个！ -谢谢你！

translation.en: [man] You're in here, buddy.
translation.zh: -你在里面 伙计 -我在里面吗？

translation.en: [Caitlyn] They put all of us in vans, and they drove us up to Montreal.
translation.zh: 他们把我们都送上面包车 带我们去蒙特利尔

translation.en: One of my motivating factors
translation.zh: 激励我的其中一个因素是

translation.en: was that I was never gonna do this again after the Games.
translation.zh: 我在奥运会后就永远不再比赛了

translation.en: I had to give up too much to be there.
translation.zh: 我必须要放弃太多才能够参赛

translation.en: Win, lose, draw.
translation.zh: 胜利、失败或是平局

translation.en: Whatever it is, I'm done.
translation.zh: 不管结局如何 我都不干了

translation.en: [Chrystie] When I got to Montreal, I was nervous.
translation.zh: 当我到了蒙特利尔 我很紧张

translation.en: I was tense.
translation.zh: 我很担心

translation.en: There were about 70 of us.
translation.zh: 我们大概有70人

translation.en: My family was there.
translation.zh: 我的家人都在

translation.en: His parents, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 有他的父母

translation.en: Cousins, friends.
translation.zh: 表兄弟 朋友

translation.en: [Vince] The athletes themselves get tickets,
translation.zh: 运动员自己有比赛门票

translation.en: and so, Bruce and Chrystie said, "Do you want a ticket?"
translation.zh: 于是布鲁斯和克里斯蒂说： “你想要门票吗？”

translation.en: Well, heck yeah! I'm going to Montreal.
translation.zh: 好吧 当然了！我要去蒙特利尔

translation.en: Autographed pictures of Bruce Jenner, right here!
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳的签名照 就在这里！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Chrystie and I were talking, and we go,
translation.zh: 克里斯蒂和我在商量 然后我们说：

translation.en: "Bertha should go." You know, she did every workout.
translation.zh: “泊莎应该去” 她参与了每次训练

translation.en: The least she can do is go to the Games.
translation.zh: 她至少也能参加一下奥运会

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The Olympics are the biggest happening in the world.
translation.zh: 奥运会是全世界最大的盛典

translation.en: Over 200 countries come together for good,
translation.zh: 超过200个国家的运动员齐聚一堂

translation.en: highlighting the best of humanity.
translation.zh: 凸显人性最好的一面

translation.en: I got to witness how big they are, the pageantry,
translation.zh: 我得以见证这些盛况 隆重的仪式

translation.en: the history behind the Olympic Games,
translation.zh: 奥运会背后的历史

translation.en: the colors, the country.
translation.zh: 不同肤色、国家

translation.en: This is bigger than anything you've ever done in your entire life.
translation.zh: 这比你这辈子做过的任何事都要重要

translation.en: [commentator] From Montreal, the Games of the 21st Olympiad,
translation.zh: 位于蒙特利尔的 第21届奥林匹克运动会

translation.en: an exclusive presentation of ABC Sports.
translation.zh: 由美国广播公司体育频道独家报道

translation.en: Today, it all begins from the great new Olympic Stadium.
translation.zh: 今天 这一切都将从 伟大的新奥林匹克体育场开始

translation.en: Next week, we'll begin our coverage of the decathlon.
translation.zh: 下周 我们会开始报道十项全能比赛

translation.en: The most demanding event in Olympic track-and-field, the decathlon…
translation.zh: 奥运会田径比赛中要求最高的项目 十项全能……

translation.en: Ten events in just two days, ending with a grueling 1500 meters run.
translation.zh: 短短两天 十个项目 以艰难的1500米跑作为结尾

translation.en: And the man who wins is generally hailed as the world's greatest athlete.
translation.zh: 获胜的人通常被誉为 世界上最伟大的运动员

translation.en: And when it's over, they say, it will be Bruce Jenner of the United States
translation.zh: 比赛结束后 他们说 冠军会是美国的布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: and Nikolai Avilov of the Soviet Union.
translation.zh: 或苏联的尼古拉阿维洛夫

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The hardest part is the decathlon's always near the end of the Games.
translation.zh: 最难的部分是 十项全能总是临近奥运会结束才举行

translation.en: You go to the big hype, you get there,
translation.zh: 你去大肆宣传 到达现场

translation.en: and then it's almost two weeks after the opening ceremonies,
translation.zh: 然后几乎是开幕式后两周

translation.en: you finally get to run the decathlon.
translation.zh: 你终于才开始进行十项全能比赛

translation.en: I didn't wanna speak to anybody.
translation.zh: 我不想跟任何人说话

translation.en: Just leave me alone.
translation.zh: 放过我吧

translation.en: Bruce Jenner, position three.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳 三号位

translation.en: Dick Schaap has two athletes from each team with him
translation.zh: 迪克斯卡普与每队两名运动员一起

translation.en: in the studios of CFCF in Montreal. Good morning, Dick.
translation.zh: 正在蒙特利尔的CFCF电视台等待连线 早上好 迪克

translation.en: Good morning, Lloyd. I hope it's not quite as early there as it is here.
translation.zh: 早上好 希望你们那里不像我们这边一样早

translation.en: We have four of the American Olympians. Bruce, your competition begins Thursday.
translation.zh: 我们这里有四位美国奥运选手 布鲁斯 你的比赛周四开始

translation.en: I have three more days to go before I have to compete.
translation.zh: 比赛前 我还有三天时间

translation.en: All the work has been done. Yesterday, I had my last training session.
translation.zh: 所有的工作都完成了 昨天 我进行了最后的训练

translation.en: So now it's just three days of rest. I stay off my legs
translation.zh: 现在只需要休息三天 避免腿部运动

translation.en: and get myself mentally prepared, really, for the competition.
translation.zh: 并为比赛做好心理准备

translation.en: That's it, gentlemen. Thank you.
translation.zh: 就是这样 先生们 感谢你们

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I did not train to be on TV.
translation.zh: 我没有训练如何在电视上出镜

translation.en: I didn't train to get paid.
translation.zh: 我不是为了赚钱而训练的

translation.en: I trained my butt off eight hours a day
translation.zh: 我每天努力训练八个小时

translation.en: to stand on the same stage as the guys that had gone before me.
translation.zh: 只为和运动员前辈们站在同一平台上

translation.en: I wanted that title of the greatest athlete in the world.
translation.zh: 我想要那个 全世界最伟大运动员的称号

translation.en: [announcer] …the athletics competitions of the Games of the 21st Olympiad.
translation.zh: …第21届奥运会的参赛选手

translation.en: [Caitlyn] As soon as I get inside the stadium, I look over,
translation.zh: 我一进体育场 抬头一看

translation.en: and I see Avilov on the other side of the track.
translation.zh: 就看到了赛道另一边的阿维洛夫

translation.en: [commentator] 8,454 points, the world record by Avilov.
translation.zh: 8454分 阿维洛夫所创造的世界纪录

translation.en: The event starts at ten o'clock in the morning and runs through the day,
translation.zh: 比赛从早晨十点开始 持续一整天

translation.en: and the first event, the 100-meter dash.
translation.zh: 第一项比赛 100米短跑

translation.en: [Caitlyn] It's a scary thing to go through.
translation.zh: 经历这种事很可怕

translation.en: When you have that much time and energy
translation.zh: 当你在某一件事中投入了

translation.en: and work invested in something like that,
translation.zh: 那么多时间、经历和努力

translation.en: and you get one try.
translation.zh: 却只有一次机会

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: -冲 布鲁斯！ -冲 布鲁斯！

translation.en: I think he broke 11! I think he broke 11.
translation.zh: 我觉得他突破11秒了！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] As I was slowing down, I kind of had a hard time slowing down.
translation.zh: 当我在减速的时候 我有点难以减速

translation.en: Maybe I did okay.
translation.zh: 也许我表现还不错

translation.en: Finally, when my time was put up on the board, I ran 10.94.
translation.zh: 终于 当我的用时出现在板子上时 我跑了10秒94

translation.en: And it was the fastest 100 meters of my life.
translation.zh: 那是我人生中跑得最快的100米

translation.en: And I thought, "Whoa!"
translation.zh: 我心想：“哇！”

translation.en: [commentator] 10.94.
819 points for Jenner. So Jenner is…
translation.zh: 詹纳获得819分 所以詹纳…

translation.en: [commentator] The second event in the decathlon, the long jump.
translation.zh: 十项全能的第二项比赛 跳远

translation.en: Here, I think you can expect Avilov to excel,
translation.zh: 这项比赛中 我想你可以期待阿维洛夫表现出色

translation.en: as well as Kratschmer, and the standings…
translation.zh: 以及克列希默 而排名…

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Avilov, a very good long jumper,
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫是个非常优秀的跳远选手

translation.en: so I can't lose too much ground to him.
translation.zh: 所以我不能输给他太多

translation.en: Now we're gonna see Bruce Jenner in the long jump.
translation.zh: 现在我们要看布鲁斯詹纳跳远了

translation.en: Bruce Jenner, this is not one of his real strong events,
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳 这并不是他的强项之一

translation.en: his personal record twenty-three eight,
translation.zh: 他的个人纪录是7.21米

translation.en: but it's a good leap by Bruce Jenner!
translation.zh: 但布鲁斯詹纳跳得很好！

translation.en: [commentator] Very good leap by Jenner!
translation.zh: 詹纳跳得很不错！

translation.en: That is a good jump, I guess.
translation.zh: 我想应该跳得不错

translation.en: Looks good.
translation.zh: 看起来不错

translation.en: -7.05! -[William] 7.05! What'd you say he wanted?
translation.zh: -7.05米！ -7.05米！你说他想要多少来着？

translation.en: -7.21, but it-- -He got it!
translation.zh: -7.21米 但是… -他做到了！

translation.en: No, no. No, no. It's, uh… It's still not as good as he wants.
translation.zh: （威廉和埃丝特詹纳） 不 还是没有达到他的预期

translation.en: [Caitlyn] That really ticked me off,
translation.zh: 那真的让我很困扰

translation.en: because I knew Avilov's ready to go.
translation.zh: 因为我知道阿维洛夫准备好了

translation.en: [commentator] We look now at the defending champion, Nikolai Avilov.
translation.zh: 现在我们来看看卫冕冠军 尼古拉阿维洛夫

translation.en: Smooth. Confidently.
translation.zh: 平稳而自信

translation.en: On the board! Good. Good reach on the board.
translation.zh: 落地！落地很稳

translation.en: He hit it right on the money.
translation.zh: 他落地很精准

translation.en: Thrust himself forward to save precious centimeters.
translation.zh: 向前一冲 获得宝贵的几厘米

translation.en: And he should… Oh, he does have a good one. Twenty-four eight for 925 points.
translation.zh: 而他应该…他的确获得了一个好成绩 7.51米 获得925分

translation.en: So Avilov should move up off that jump.
translation.zh: 所以阿维洛夫应该就取这次成绩了

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Go, Jenner, go! Go, Jenner, go! Go, Jenner, go!
translation.zh: 加油 詹纳 加油！

translation.en: [commentator] Fine throw by Bruce Jenner!
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳投得很不错！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I put it just a little over 50 feet, 4 inches.
translation.zh: 我铅球投了约15.35米

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -And it got me up to second place.
translation.zh: 让我升到了第二名

translation.en: [commentator] Now we've come to the event that is a favorite of Nikolai Avilov.
translation.zh: 现在来到了尼古拉阿维洛夫 擅长的一项比赛

translation.en: He's outstanding in the high jump.
translation.zh: 他在跳高方面十分杰出

translation.en: Avilov watches Bruce Jenner of the United States,
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫看着美国的布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: who is going at six-eight,
translation.zh: 挑战2.03米的高度

translation.en: and this will be a new personal record for Jenner.
translation.zh: 这将会是詹纳的个人新纪录

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I took my first two attempts.
translation.zh: 我前两次尝试

translation.en: -[crowd] Oh! -[Caitlyn] Didn't make it.
translation.zh: 都失败了

translation.en: And I'm down to my third and final attempt.
translation.zh: 我只剩第三次 也就是最后一次机会

translation.en: I remember standing back there, getting ready to go.
translation.zh: 我记得站在后面 准备起跳

translation.en: And looking at that bar and just thinking,
translation.zh: 看着那根杆心想

translation.en: "If I don't do this,
translation.zh: “如果我不成功

translation.en: it's over."
translation.zh: 一切就结束了”

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[commentator] Oh yeah!
translation.zh: 哦耶！

translation.en: Bruce Jenner! And again, he cleared it with something to spare.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳！他又一次突破了自己

translation.en: 882 points for Jenner.
translation.zh: 詹纳获得882分

translation.en: Bruce is delighted. Why wouldn't he be?
translation.zh: 布鲁斯很高兴 他怎么能不高兴呢？

translation.en: Now let's come back to the man who considers this his event.
translation.zh: 现在让我们回到这个 认为跳高是自己强项的男人

translation.en: Seven feet, 1/4 inch, the bar.
translation.zh: 2.14米的杆

translation.en: -Got it! -[crowd cheers]
translation.zh: 成功！

translation.en: I don't think he even touched it!
translation.zh: 我觉得他甚至都没碰到杆

translation.en: Nikolai Avilov clears at seven feet, 1/4 inch.
translation.zh: 尼古拉阿维洛夫跳过了2.14米

translation.en: On the decathlon scale, it is 975 points,
translation.zh: 以十项全能的分数计算 成绩折合为975分

translation.en: and it's a new personal record for Avilov.
translation.zh: 这是阿维洛夫的个人新纪录

translation.en: Avilov now is second.
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫现在是第二名

translation.en: He jumped from fifth to second, followed by Jenner and Zeilbauer.
translation.zh: 他从第五升至第二 紧随其后是詹纳和齐尔鲍尔

translation.en: The fifth event for the men's decathlon, 400 meters.
translation.zh: 男子十项全能第五项 400米

translation.en: But a particularly outstanding effort by someone
translation.zh: 但如果有人成绩特别出色

translation.en: could change some of the standings,
translation.zh: 就有可能改变排名

translation.en: though it would seem that it'll take a stunning time
translation.zh: 虽然挤进前三名

translation.en: to make much of a difference in the top three.
translation.zh: 可能还需要一段时间

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I had thought about this 400-meter race for four years.
translation.zh: 我想了这场400米比赛四年了

translation.en: Exactly how I wanted to run it.
translation.zh: 精确到我该如何去跑这场比赛

translation.en: -Gun goes off. -[starting pistol fires]
translation.zh: 枪声一响

translation.en: [commentator] We've got a fair start. Now, as they come off the curve, let's see what kind of…
translation.zh: 我们有一个公平的开始 现在 他们跑出弯道…

translation.en: [Caitlyn] And I thought, "I am going to run
translation.zh: 我想： “我要跑出我人生中最好的一个弯道”

translation.en: the best second turn I've ever run in my life."
translation.zh: “我要跑出我人生中最好的一个弯道”

translation.en: [Caitlyn] And I'm looking at that line coming up in the turn,
translation.zh: 我看着即将转弯处的那条线

translation.en: and I'm thinking,
translation.zh: 心想：

translation.en: "Don't back off."
translation.zh: “别退缩”

translation.en: And as we come to the finish line, it is Bruce Jenner way out in front.
translation.zh: 当我们接近终点线时 布鲁斯詹纳遥遥领先

translation.en: [commentator] Checking the time for Bruce Jenner.
translation.zh: 正在核对布鲁斯詹纳的用时

translation.en: That 47.51 is worth 923 points.
translation.zh: 47秒51 折合为923分

translation.en: So now, as we look at the standings after five events,
translation.zh: 现在 来看一下五场比赛后的排名

translation.en: you can see that only 35 points separate the top three,
translation.zh: 可以看到 前三名只相差35分

translation.en: and we'll go into the final five events tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天将会举行最后五场比赛

translation.en: -[reporter] Anything to say to Avilov? -No, not really. We were really…
translation.zh: 你有什么话要对阿维洛夫说吗？ 没有 我们…

translation.en: We get along very well. We're always kidding each other about…
translation.zh: 我们相处得很好 我们总是互相开玩笑

translation.en: Like, I made six-eight and smiled at him, and he said, "That's very good."
translation.zh: 比如说 我跳过了2.03米的高度 然后冲他微笑 他说：“好极了”

translation.en: Then when he made 7 foot, I said the same to him.
translation.zh: 当他跳过2.13米的高度时 我也会恭喜他

translation.en: We get along very well. There's no rivalry or anything. Just, um…
translation.zh: 我们相处得很好 没有敌对之类的事 就只是…我看到别人曾说过一句话：

translation.en: I saw a quote, "I love my competitors 'cause they bring the most out of me."
translation.zh: 就只是…我看到别人曾说过一句话： “我爱我的竞争对手 因为他们能激发出我的潜能”

translation.en: That's the situation with myself and Avilov.
translation.zh: 我和阿维洛夫就是这样

translation.en: This is probably gonna be his best meet and mine too.
translation.zh: 这可是会是我们俩 表现最优秀的一次比赛

translation.en: [Caitlyn] 35 points out of the lead, and all my good events are coming up.
translation.zh: 第一名领先了35分 而我的强势项目就要来了

translation.en: So now becomes the problem.
translation.zh: 所以现在成了问题

translation.en: You have an Olympic gold medal on the line…
translation.zh: 奥林匹克金牌岌岌可危

translation.en: and you're supposed to lay there and sleep.
translation.zh: 而你却应该躺在那里睡觉

translation.en: [Caitlyn] And it poured all night long.
translation.zh: 那天晚上下了一整夜的雨

translation.en: You think about all the variables that are out there.
translation.zh: 你会考虑外面所有的变数

translation.en: "What if I lose?"
translation.zh: “如果我输了怎么办？”

translation.en: And to be honest with you,
translation.zh: 老实说

translation.en: it scared me to death.
translation.zh: 我怕得要死

translation.en: [Caitlyn] My heart was pounding so hard.
translation.zh: 我的心跳得很快

translation.en: And I hear this tick-tick-tick.
translation.zh: 我能听到滴答滴答的声音

translation.en: The clock is ticking.
translation.zh: 时钟在计时

translation.en: Every tick of that clock,
translation.zh: 时钟每响一下

translation.en: the end of sports gets closer.
translation.zh: 我离运动生涯的结束就更近一步

translation.en: Woke up the next morning. The ground was soaking wet.
translation.zh: 第二天早晨醒来 地面湿透了

translation.en: [commentator] The flame flickering brightly
translation.zh: 在蒙特利尔一个凉爽、阴沉 和相当潮湿的日子里

translation.en: here at Olympic Stadium on a cool, dark, and rather wet day in Montreal.
translation.zh: 在蒙特利尔一个凉爽、阴沉 和相当潮湿的日子里 奥林匹克体育场的圣火在熊熊燃烧

translation.en: Our decathletes now go into the sixth event
translation.zh: 我们的十项全能选手 现在进入第六场比赛

translation.en: with these standings, but only 35 points separate the top three.
translation.zh: 虽然排名如此 但前三名的成绩仅相差35分

translation.en: [Vince] The hurdles are a really scary event.
translation.zh: 跨栏真的很可怕

translation.en: There's a lot of opportunity to fail.
translation.zh: 有很多失败的可能

translation.en: If you miss a hurdle, you fall down on the hurdles, you're dead.
translation.zh: 如果少跨一个栏 或是摔倒 你就完蛋了

translation.en: [commentator] …without the blocks, and it sounds like trees…
translation.zh: 没有障碍 而它听起来像树…

translation.en: Oh! Dixon is stopped. He just absolutely…
translation.zh: 哦！迪克森停下了 他刚才绝对…

translation.en: [Caitlyn] A couple of flights ahead of me, Fred Dixon, one of the other Americans,
translation.zh: 比我早几场预赛的弗雷迪迪克森 另一个美国队选手

translation.en: slipped on the track. Just destroyed his time.
translation.zh: 摔倒在了赛道上 毁掉了他的成绩

translation.en: [commentator] Fred Dixon comes in at 18 seconds-plus.
translation.zh: 弗雷迪迪克森用时超过18秒

translation.en: [Chrystie] It was over for him.
translation.zh: 他的比赛结束了

translation.en: He lost enough points that he couldn't make it up.
translation.zh: 他输掉的分数再也追不回来了

translation.en: So Bruce was pretty freaked out.
translation.zh: 所以布鲁斯吓坏了

translation.en: [commentator] Now we move to the second heat.
translation.zh: 现在我们进入第二场预赛

translation.en: And in this one, we feature Nikolai Avilov.
translation.zh: 这一场比赛有尼古拉阿维洛夫

translation.en: This is one of his stronger events.
translation.zh: 这是他的强项之一

translation.en: And Avilov sitting in second place behind Kratschmer after five events.
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫在五场比赛后 仅次于克列希默 位列第二

translation.en: Let's watch Avilov now in lane number four. He looks sound.
translation.zh: 现在来看看在第四道的阿维洛夫 他看上去不错

translation.en: And he's got the lead.
translation.zh: 并且具有领先优势

translation.en: Here comes Samara. Fred running a very strong race.
translation.zh: 萨马拉紧随其后 他的战况异常胶着

translation.en: Zeilbauer of Austria in second place,
translation.zh: 来自奥地利的齐尔鲍尔位居第二

translation.en: and Samara takes the third.
translation.zh: 萨马拉获得了第三名

translation.en: Avilov with a very good time in the hurdles.
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫在跨栏中表现相当不错

translation.en: 14.20 seconds.
14.20. That'll be a new personal record for him.
translation.zh: 14秒20 这将会是他的个人新纪录

translation.en: 939 points for that time.
translation.zh: 这样的成绩对应的分数是939分

translation.en: Add that to his 4315, and he stays right in there.
translation.zh: 再加上他已有的4315分 他稳居前三

translation.en: [commentator] Now we move to the final 110-meter hurdles.
translation.zh: 现在我们来到最后一场110米栏

translation.en: It is Bruce Jenner of the United States.
translation.zh: 这是来自美国的布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: [Caitlyn] There was a lot of pressure.
translation.zh: 当时压力很大

translation.en: You hit your big toe on a hurdle and fall down, and it's over.
translation.zh: 你的大脚趾碰到跨栏 然后摔倒 一切就结束了

translation.en: I don't care what my time is. I just wanna live through this race.
translation.zh: 我不在乎自己的用时 我只想成功度过这场比赛

translation.en: [commentator] Jenner getting out very well, and Bruce is getting over the hurdles.
translation.zh: 詹纳表现很好 他跨过了栏

translation.en: He's not banging his legs on the hurdles. He has not knocked one down yet.
translation.zh: 他的腿没有碰到栏 也没撞倒一个栏

translation.en: Skowronek of, uh, Poland wins it.
translation.zh: 波兰的斯高罗内克赢得了这一场比赛

translation.en: Gémise of France is third, and Jenner gets a solid second.
translation.zh: 法国的盖弥斯获得第三 而詹纳则稳居第二

translation.en: Looking for Jenner's time, it is 14.84.
translation.zh: 詹纳的用时是14秒84

translation.en: That's 866 points.
translation.zh: 那相当于866分

translation.en: He shakes his head at the time, but I'm sure that Bruce is glad it's over.
translation.zh: 他对自己的用时摇头 但我敢说布鲁斯会庆幸比赛结束了

translation.en: But your overall standings after six events,
translation.zh: 六场比赛后的排名

translation.en: we see Avilov, Kratschmer, and Jenner.
translation.zh: 我们看到阿维洛夫、克列希默和詹纳 稳居前三名

translation.en: They are well out in front. Dixon is gone.
translation.zh: 我们看到阿维洛夫、克列希默和詹纳 稳居前三名 迪克森出榜了

translation.en: We're going to concentrate now on Nikolai Avilov and Bruce Jenner
translation.zh: 我们现在将聚焦 尼古拉阿维洛夫和布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: because that's where the decision is gonna be made.
translation.zh: 因为冠军将从他们两人中诞生

translation.en: [Caitlyn] All my events coming up now are my best events.
translation.zh: 现在开始的所有项目都是我的强项

translation.en: And to be honest with you, I thought for everybody else,
translation.zh: 老实说 我为其他人着想

translation.en: "It's over. You can all go home," you know. "This one's mine."
translation.zh: “比赛结束了 你们可以回家了” 你懂的 “现在是我的主场”

translation.en: [commentator chuckles] He grunted loud enough, didn't he?
translation.zh: 他的声音够大了 对吧？

translation.en: It almost… Did it stay in?
translation.zh: 它几乎…它在线内吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I guess it did.
translation.zh: 对 我想是的

translation.en: [commentator] 8,454 points, the world record by Avilov.
translation.zh: 8454分 由阿维洛夫创造的世界纪录

translation.en: Jenner, at 26 years of age, called the perfect decathlete.
translation.zh: 今年26岁的詹纳被称为 最优秀的十项全能选手

translation.en: He is the top contender.
translation.zh: 他是金牌强有力的竞争者

translation.en: [chanting] Go, Jenner, go! Go, Jenner, go! Go, Jenner, go!
translation.zh: 加油 詹纳 加油！

translation.en: [commentator] Here's Jenner going, and he's way…
translation.zh: 詹纳起跳了 他远超…

translation.en: He is way, way over the bar.
translation.zh: 他远超栏杆的高度

translation.en: And Jenner is moving ahead of the schedule that he had in mind.
translation.zh: 詹纳正在提前完成他的计划

translation.en: [chanting continues] Go, Jenner, go! Go, Jenner, go! Go, Jenner, go! Go, Jenner, go!
translation.zh: 加油 詹纳 加油！

translation.en: [commentator] When you come to the javelin,
translation.zh: 当比赛进行到标枪 十项全能的第九项比赛

translation.en: the ninth event in the decathlon, the body is screaming for mercy.
translation.zh: 当比赛进行到标枪 十项全能的第九项比赛 运动员的身体都在尖叫着求饶

translation.en: Bruce Jenner, a lifetime mark in the javelin of 227 feet, 11 inches.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳的个人记录是69.47米

translation.en: Now, if he can reach anywhere near that, he's gonna slam the door.
translation.zh: 现在 如果他能接近自己的记录距离 就能置自己于不败之地

translation.en: [commentator] Let it go. It's a good one.
translation.zh: 松手 这一记很好

translation.en: [commentator] It's beyond 220 feet for Bruce Jenner.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳的距离超过了67.06米

translation.en: That runs his point total to 7904 points.
translation.zh: 这样一来 他的总分达到了7904分

translation.en: Avilov remains third.
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫依然是第三名

translation.en: [commentator] The events have been knocked off one by one, and now only one remains.
translation.zh: 比赛逐一结束 现在只剩最后一项

translation.en: The hardest event of all.
translation.zh: 最难的一项

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The last event, the 1500 meters, that's what the decathlon's all about.
translation.zh: 最后一个项目 1500米 这就是十项全能的核心

translation.en: You've been out there for two days, ten hours a day.
translation.zh: 你在赛场上待了两天 每天10小时

translation.en: You think you're pretty tough, okay?
translation.zh: 你觉得你很坚强 对吗？

translation.en: 1500 meters is for the tough guys,
translation.zh: 1500米是给坚强的人准备的

translation.en: and that was my best event.
translation.zh: 而那是我最强的项目

translation.en: Because I wasn't afraid of pain.
translation.zh: 因为我不惧怕疼痛

translation.en: [commentator] This is one of those moments
translation.zh: 这是给这个巨型场馆

translation.en: that has brought capacity crowd to this massive structure.
translation.zh: 带来大量人群的时刻之一

translation.en: All of the training, all of the talking, all of the psyching, it's all been done.
translation.zh: 一切训练、谈话和心理准备 一切都尘埃落定

translation.en: Now the gold medal is on the line, and we'll be standing by for the start.
translation.zh: 现在金牌就在眼前 我们将随时待命 等待比赛开始

translation.en: [Caitlyn] For me, this wasn't just about the gold medal.
translation.zh: 对我来说 这不只关乎金牌

translation.en: It was about breaking the world record.
translation.zh: 事关打破世界纪录

translation.en: I wanted to get over 8,600 points, 'cause nobody had ever done that before.
translation.zh: 我想拿到超过8600分 因为之前从未有人能达成

translation.en: And I wanted to do it in front of Avilov.
translation.zh: 而且我想在阿维洛夫面前创造记录

translation.en: If I do that, I will have accomplished everything that I ever wanted to do.
translation.zh: 如果我这么做了 我就完成了自己曾经想做的一切

translation.en: I wasn't gonna run this one slow.
translation.zh: 我不会慢吞吞地跑完这场比赛

translation.en: [commentator] Bruce Jenner looks reasonably loose and comfortable.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳看起来相当放松和舒适

translation.en: If he runs a 4:35.8 or better,
translation.zh: 如果他能跑进4分35秒8

translation.en: he is going to have a new world record.
translation.zh: 他就将会创造一项新的世界纪录

translation.en: Avilov would have to beat him by about 22 seconds.
translation.zh: 阿维洛夫要快约22秒才能把他打败

translation.en: [Caitlyn] During the race, I was mostly thinking pace, pace, pace,
translation.zh: 比赛期间 我最常想的就是 步伐、步伐、步伐

translation.en: what I'm doing, where I'm at in the race.
translation.zh: 我在做什么 我在比赛里的位置如何

translation.en: And then I passed Avilov on the first lap.
translation.zh: 然后我在第一圈超过了阿维洛夫

translation.en: And right then is actually when I realized that I can do this.
translation.zh: 就在那时 我意识到我能成功

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I can break the world record. It's right there.
translation.zh: 我能打破世界纪录 它就在眼前

translation.en: All I gotta do is reach out and grab it.
translation.zh: 我只需要伸出手抓住它

translation.en: He's gotta come through over there at the starting line
translation.zh: 他必须要在2分16或2分17内

translation.en: in about a 2:16 or a 2:17.
translation.zh: 穿过那边的起跑线才行

translation.en: If he doesn't… What the hell is he doing?
translation.zh: 如果他没能…他在搞什么鬼呢？

translation.en: [yells] Run for it, Bruce! Go!
translation.zh: 快跑啊 布鲁斯！快跑！

translation.en: -[woman] Go, Bruce! -Don't stop, Jenner!
translation.zh: -加油 布鲁斯！ -别停下 詹纳！

translation.en: Step it up, Bruce! It's too slow!
translation.zh: 加快步伐 布鲁斯！现在太慢了！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I always knew, coming down for the last event,
translation.zh: 我一直知道 到了最后一场比赛

translation.en: I can run any time I have to run.
translation.zh: 我想跑多长时间都行

translation.en: Uh, with 300 meters to go, I said,
translation.zh: 剩下300米 我说：

translation.en: "Whatever you got left, go for it."
translation.zh: “不管你剩多少力量 全力冲刺吧”

translation.en: [commentator] He's putting on the kick.
translation.zh: 他开始冲刺了

translation.en: Bruce Jenner is kicking up the back straight.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳在后面奋起直追

translation.en: He's making a run at Lytvynenko!
translation.zh: 他在追赶利特维年科

translation.en: He wants the world record.
translation.zh: 他想要世界纪录

translation.en: His personal best is 4:13.6.
translation.zh: 他的个人最好成绩是4分13秒6

translation.en: Lytvynenko trying to hold on.
translation.zh: 利特维年科想要保持优势

translation.en: Bruce Jenner is striving.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳在拼命追赶

translation.en: And Jenner is coming hard.
translation.zh: 他用尽力气奔跑

translation.en: But what is the time?
translation.zh: 成绩是多少？

translation.en: Bruce Jenner has hit the world record in the decathlon sideways!
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳创下了 十项全能的世界新纪录 （新世界纪录 8618分）

translation.en: [commentator] The crowd on its feet, roaring its appreciation
translation.zh: 人们站了起来 为这位来自加州圣何塞的26岁男子…

translation.en: of a tremendous effort
translation.zh: 为这位来自加州圣何塞的26岁男子… （布鲁斯詹纳 美国 金牌得主）

translation.en: by the 26-year-old man from San Jose, California.
translation.zh: …所付出的巨大的努力 发出赞赏的咆哮

translation.en: Nikolai Avilov walking so wearily across the track.
translation.zh: 尼古拉阿维洛夫疲惫地穿过赛道 （尼古拉阿维洛夫 苏联 铜牌得主）

translation.en: There's the pain of the decathlon.
translation.zh: 那就是十项全能的痛苦

translation.en: Bruce Jenner is still upright and refuses to let fatigue pull him down.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳仍然挺直身体 拒绝被身体的疲劳拉倒

translation.en: My goodness!
translation.zh: 我的老天！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] No matter how hard I ran the race,
translation.zh: 不管我比赛有多拼命

translation.en: I would never fall at the finish line.
translation.zh: 我都永远不会在终点摔倒

translation.en: 'Cause I've been through a lot in my life.
translation.zh: 因为我这辈子经历了很多

translation.en: And I had to fight to get there.
translation.zh: 而我拼尽全力才达到这样的成就

translation.en: [Caitlyn] And nobody knew…
translation.zh: 无人知晓

translation.en: [Caitlyn] …what this moment was actually all about.
translation.zh: 这一刻究竟是为了什么

translation.en: [Chrystie] When he won,
translation.zh: 当他获胜的时候

translation.en: it was pretty amazing. And…
translation.zh: 这太令人惊喜了 然后…

translation.en: he came over to give me a hug.
translation.zh: 他过来给了我一个拥抱

translation.en: I stepped over the banister, and he gave me a hug, and…
translation.zh: 我翻过栏杆 然后他给了我一个拥抱

translation.en: [sniffles] He said, "We did it."
translation.zh: 他说：“我们做到了”

translation.en: It was a wonderful moment that he gave me.
translation.zh: 那是他给我的美好时刻

translation.en: He said, "We did it."
translation.zh: 他说的是：“我们做到了”

translation.en: When he was up there on the podium,
translation.zh: 当他站在领奖台上时

translation.en: I could see his face.
translation.zh: 我能看到他的脸

translation.en: And I knew him, and I knew that he was struggling not to cry.
translation.zh: 我了解他 我知道他在强忍着泪水

translation.en: And he looked over at me and saw me crying, and then he laughed.
translation.zh: 他望向我 看到我在哭 然后他就笑了

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I am standing on the same platform as all of these guys before me.
translation.zh: 我和所有的运动前辈站在同一平台上

translation.en: But… I'm scared to death.
translation.zh: 但我害怕得要死

translation.en: What's my life going to be like from this point on?
translation.zh: 从现在开始 我的人生将会是怎样？

translation.en: [Bruce] That was real! I don't bite!
translation.zh: 不用怕我！

translation.en: You were going down that 1500 meters, and I said, "If you can run that hard
translation.zh: 你在跑1500米的时候 我说： “如果你1500米能那么拼命跑 那我也能戒烟！”

translation.en: -in the 1500 meters, I can quit smoking!" -[laughs]
translation.zh: “如果你1500米能那么拼命跑 那我也能戒烟！”

translation.en: -And I mean it. -Deal! Stick around a little longer.
translation.zh: -我是认真的 -成交！再待一会儿

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I climbed every mountain.
translation.zh: 我翻越了群山峻岭

translation.en: I accomplished everything I could possibly accomplish.
translation.zh: 达成了所有可能的成就

translation.en: Bruce Jenner, Olympic champion.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳 奥林匹克冠军

translation.en: [Caitlyn] World's greatest athlete.
translation.zh: 世界上最伟大的运动员

translation.en: But I was still the same old person with all the same old issues.
translation.zh: 但我依然是那个有着相同问题的人

translation.en: And then I remember the next day, uh, waking up, went into the bathroom.
translation.zh: 我记得第二天 我起床后走进洗手间

translation.en: Uh, the medal was sitting there on the counter.
translation.zh: 金牌就躺在台子上

translation.en: And I didn't have a stitch of clothes on, but the medal around my neck,
translation.zh: 我一丝不挂 只有脖子上挂着的奖牌

translation.en: looked into a full-length mirror and said,
translation.zh: 我对着一面全身镜说：

translation.en: "What the hell did you just do?"
translation.zh: “你之前到底做了些什么？”

translation.en: It's a great pleasure to welcome the Olympic decathlon winner.
translation.zh: 我们很荣幸请来奥运会十项全能冠军

translation.en: Bruce Jenner is with us tonight.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳 来参加我们今晚的活动

translation.en: [host] Bruce.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯

translation.en: [host] And later, there is Bruce Jenner.
translation.zh: 接下来 有请布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: -Bruce Jenner. -Bruce Jenner.
translation.zh: -布鲁斯詹纳 -布鲁斯詹纳

translation.en: You're probably getting tired of congratulations,
translation.zh: 你可能厌倦了人们的祝贺

translation.en: but, uh, really, what a super magnificent performance it was.
translation.zh: 但真的 你的比赛非常精彩

translation.en: Yeah. It's been about seven weeks now since the Games have been over,
translation.zh: 嗯 距离比赛结束已经有七周时间了

translation.en: and, yeah, my life really has changed.
translation.zh: 我的人生也真的改变了

translation.en: [Caitlyn] After the Games, they literally had traffic jams of people
translation.zh: 奥运会结束后 所到之处 真的会有大批人群

translation.en: and cabs stopping in the middle of the street
translation.zh: 出租车司机半路停下

translation.en: running out to shake your hand.
translation.zh: 跑过来和你握手

translation.en: Rich Harkins called Jenner's effort at the Montreal Olympics
translation.zh: 里奇哈金斯称 詹纳在蒙特利尔奥运会上的努力

translation.en: "one of the outstanding performances of this decade."
translation.zh: 是“这十年来最出色的表现之一”

translation.en: In the beginning, it was kind of fun. He was a hero.
translation.zh: 一开始 这有点有趣 他是个英雄

translation.en: [Vince] He was the ultimate hero. The world's greatest athlete.
translation.zh: 他是终极英雄 世界最伟大的运动员

translation.en: All of a sudden, you're in the limelight all the time.
translation.zh: 突然间 你成了众人瞩目的焦点

translation.en: Everywhere you go, people know who you are. It's gotta be different.
translation.zh: 不管你去哪里 人们都认识你 这肯定不一样

translation.en: I'm Bruce Jenner. I know a lot of races are really won on the starting blocks.
translation.zh: 我是布鲁斯詹纳 我知道很多比赛都是赢在起跑线上

translation.en: [Caitlyn] Did I build this character up so big and so publicly…
translation.zh: 我是否把这个角色 塑造得过于伟大和公开了…

translation.en: "Bruce," that I'm stuck with him?
translation.zh: “布鲁斯” 以至于我深陷其中了？

translation.en: I spent a good part of my life getting ready for that day.
translation.zh: 我为比赛花费了大量时间准备

translation.en: I put in a lot of years and downed a lot of Wheaties,
translation.zh: 我花了很多年 也吃了很多麦片

translation.en: because a complete breakfast with Wheaties is good tasting… and good for you.
translation.zh: 因为配有麦片的完整早餐 既美味又有益

translation.en: [man] Take it from Bruce Jenner. Wheaties is the Breakfast of Champions.
translation.zh: 相信布鲁斯詹纳 麦片是冠军之选的早餐

translation.en: We spent a lot of time together, even after the Olympics.
translation.zh: 即使在奥运会之后 我们也经常相聚

translation.en: But he had a lot of things coming at him. Endorsements, acting…
translation.zh: 但他有很多事情 代言、演戏…

translation.en: Look, a guy with your athletic ability… I mean, you're a natural.
translation.zh: 听着 有你这样运动能力的人… 你就是天选之子

translation.en: [laughs] Well… Wait a minute, wait a minute. What's this all about?
translation.zh: 等一下 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Eventually, he had to move on, but life does that to you.
translation.zh: 最终 他不得不前进 因为生活就是这样

translation.en: [man] A Sports Illustrated article said the rest of your life will be a success.
translation.zh: 《体育画报》的那篇文章说 你余生都会成功 是这样的吗？

translation.en: -Does that make sense? Is that right? -Well…
translation.zh: 你余生都会成功 是这样的吗？ 我觉得我的余生会更加有趣

translation.en: I think the rest of my life will be a lot more interesting
translation.zh: 我觉得我的余生会更加有趣

translation.en: because of what I did in Montreal, but I don't know about a success.
translation.zh: 因为我在蒙特利尔所取得的成果 但我不知道那算不算成功

translation.en: [Chrystie] It was just hard to catch our breath,
translation.zh: 我们难以喘息

translation.en: and no privacy.
translation.zh: 毫无隐私

translation.en: For Chrystie and I, the dynamics of the relationship was totally different.
translation.zh: 对克里斯蒂和我来说 这段感情的状态完全不同

translation.en: Young ladies all over the world have, uh, gotta say,
translation.zh: 全世界的年轻姑娘都会说：

translation.en: "Wow, there's the decathlon champ," and, uh…
translation.zh: “哇哦 他是十项全能冠军” 然后…

translation.en: My wife and I are very close together,
translation.zh: 我的妻子和我关系很亲密

translation.en: and it's made it a little bit difficult on her sometimes, uh,
translation.zh: 这让她有的时候有点难办

translation.en: all of a sudden, the immediate change in our lives.
translation.zh: 突然间 那一刻改变了我们的生活

translation.en: [Chrystie] That change was difficult for me.
translation.zh: 这种改变对我来说很困难

translation.en: But we know now that there's other issues that were brewing at the time.
translation.zh: 但我们现在知道 当时还有其他问题正在暗中发酵

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The Olympics were a big, big distraction from who I was.
translation.zh: 奥运会大大分散了 我自我认同问题的精力

translation.en: I got scared that maybe now I have to deal with myself.
translation.zh: 我开始害怕 因为也许现在我要面对真实的自己了

translation.en: People love a good story like this.
translation.zh: 人们喜欢这样的美满故事

translation.en: The all-American kid, the wife who's working.
translation.zh: 美国标板式的年轻人 妻子在工作

translation.en: I didn't think I could live up to that.
translation.zh: 我没想到自己能过上这样的理想生活

translation.en: Even though we were having challenges in the marriage,
translation.zh: 即使我们在婚姻里遇到了一些挑战

translation.en: we wanted to start a family.
translation.zh: 我们也想要组建家庭

translation.en: So we had Burt.
translation.zh: 于是我们有了伯特

translation.en: [Bruce] There he is. Burt Jenner.
translation.zh: 就是他 伯特詹纳

translation.en: -Age… Uh, how many days? -[Chrystie] Five days.
translation.zh: 年龄 多少天了？ 五天

translation.en: Say something to 'em, Burt.
translation.zh: 跟他们说句话 伯特

translation.en: There you go. You want the mic?
translation.zh: 好了 你想要麦克风吗？

translation.en: You can tell he's a Jenner. He goes right for the mic.
translation.zh: 你能猜出来他姓詹纳 这么小就会抢麦克风了

translation.en: -[Chrystie] Burt, this way! -Hey, Burt, there's Mommy!
translation.zh: 伯特 看这边！ 嘿 看 妈妈在这里！

translation.en: -[Chrystie] Burt! Hi! -There's Mommy!
translation.zh: -伯特！嗨！ -妈妈来了！

translation.en: [Burt Jenner] As early as my memories start,
translation.zh: 从我能记事起

translation.en: I knew there was something different about my dad.
translation.zh: 我就知道我爸爸有一些不同

translation.en: Before the Olympics, my dad was…
translation.zh: 在奥运会之前 我爸爸只是无名小卒

translation.en: was a nobody, you know, that nobody had ever heard of,
translation.zh: 在奥运会之前 我爸爸只是无名小卒 （伯特詹纳） 你知道的 没人听说过他

translation.en: but after the Olympics, she was the world's greatest athlete…
translation.zh: 但奥运会之后 她成了世界最伟大的运动员

translation.en: …which is a blessing and curse at the same time.
translation.zh: 这是福亦是祸

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I love being a dad.
translation.zh: 我喜欢当父亲

translation.en: My kids were wonderful,
translation.zh: 我的孩子们都很棒

translation.en: but it was another distraction from who I am.
translation.zh: 但这又是我面对真实自己的 另一个阻碍

translation.en: [Chrystie] He told me once how he was really unhappy.
translation.zh: 他曾经跟我说过他很不开心

translation.en: And what I was hearing was that he was unhappy with me.
translation.zh: 而我听到的是 他对我不满意

translation.en: [Caitlyn] It was just this massive secret in my life I couldn't talk about.
translation.zh: 那是我生命中无法启齿的大秘密

translation.en: She didn't know that I was struggling with all this stuff in my head.
translation.zh: 她不知道我在和大脑里的这些想法 做着挣扎

translation.en: I didn't want people to know me and know who I was.
translation.zh: 我不想让人知道我 并且了解我真实的样子

translation.en: I just saw him needing to grasp onto something.
translation.zh: 我只是看到他需要抓住某些东西

translation.en: And I told him,
translation.zh: 我跟他说：

translation.en: "When you've decided to see a therapist, then I'll come home."
translation.zh: “当你决定看医生时 我就会回家”

translation.en: But he didn't.
translation.zh: 但他没有

translation.en: It is what it is.
translation.zh: 事实就是这样

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I thought when Chrystie and I went our separate directions
translation.zh: 我以为当克里斯蒂和我各奔东西时

translation.en: that I could figure myself out.
translation.zh: 我就能认清自己

translation.en: I basically isolated myself from the world.
translation.zh: 我基本上把自己与世界隔绝了

translation.en: I wound up all by myself in a shack in Malibu.
translation.zh: 独自一人窝在马里布的一个小屋里

translation.en: I was suffering badly from gender dysphoria.
translation.zh: 我因性别焦虑症而焦虑不安

translation.en: And that was the beginning of the worst six years of my life.
translation.zh: 那是我人生中最糟糕六年的开端

translation.en: [Burt] I remember I was at my grandmother's house.
translation.zh: 我记得我在奶奶家

translation.en: And my dad flew down to pick me up.
translation.zh: 然后我爸爸飞过来接我

translation.en: And this was…
translation.zh: 这是在…

translation.en: at least ten years after they had been divorced.
translation.zh: 他们离婚至少十年后的事

translation.en: They never hung out.
translation.zh: 他们从未见面

translation.en: That was when my father had told my mom that,
translation.zh: 那时我爸爸告诉妈妈…

translation.en: he-- she had started to transition.
translation.zh: 她开始变性了

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I remember watching TV,
translation.zh: 我记得当时在看电视

translation.en: and on the news,
translation.zh: 新闻上

translation.en: they had a report from the Orange County Transgender Association.
translation.zh: 有一篇来自橘郡跨性别协会的报道

translation.en: On the average of around one a week, somewhere in the United States,
translation.zh: 平均一周一次 在美国的某个地方

translation.en: an individual is undergoing an operation to change his or her sex.
translation.zh: 就有人在经历改变他或她性别的手术

translation.en: The operation has become much more prevalent
translation.zh: 这项手术已经比一般公众所认知的

translation.en: than the general public has realized.
translation.zh: 要普遍得多

translation.en: I called 'em up, said that I was looking for a therapist.
translation.zh: 我给他们打电话 说我在寻找一个治疗师

translation.en: I couldn't tell 'em my name or who I was.
translation.zh: 我无法告诉他们我的名字或我是谁

translation.en: And for the first time, I could really kind of sit down
translation.zh: 然后 我生平第一次能够坐下

translation.en: and try to, with a professional, try to figure myself out.
translation.zh: 试着和一名专业人士一起 了解真实的自我

translation.en: It was hard for me to understand at first.
translation.zh: 一开始我很难理解

translation.en: Started taking hormone pills
translation.zh: 他开始服用荷尔蒙药片

translation.en: and had electrolysis to get rid of the beard, and…
translation.zh: 并用电解除毛术去掉胡须 还有…

translation.en: I'll never forget just having to get up out of the middle of class in sixth grade…
translation.zh: 我永远都不会忘记 自己会在六年级的课堂上冲出教室

translation.en: uh, because I was about ready to break down in tears,
translation.zh: 因为我马上就要流下崩溃的泪水

translation.en: and nobody knew why.
translation.zh: 而没人知道为什么

translation.en: And I just got up and ran out of the room.
translation.zh: 然后我就起身跑出教室了

translation.en: And just went and cried in the hallway.
translation.zh: 我在走廊里大哭

translation.en: But it wasn't because my dad was gonna transition. It was…
translation.zh: 但这不是因为我爸爸要变性 而是…

translation.en: I was afraid my father was going to transition into someone
translation.zh: 我害怕我爸爸会变成另一个人

translation.en: and go somewhere, and I would never see my father again.
translation.zh: 然后去一个我永远都见不到他的地方

translation.en: Yeah, those were… Those were tough times.
translation.zh: 是的 那是一段艰难的时光

translation.en: I tried with transition, but I was too scared.
translation.zh: 我试过变性 但我当时太害怕了

translation.en: Too scared.
translation.zh: 太恐惧了

translation.en: Five, six months later, I met Kris, and she was great for me.
translation.zh: 五、六个月后 我遇见了克莉丝 她对我很好

translation.en: She pulled me out of my funk and kept me going,
translation.zh: 她把我从绝望之中拉出来 让我继续前进

translation.en: getting back into life as Bruce.
translation.zh: 继续作为布鲁斯的人生

translation.en: I can't do the other things, so let's just be a good Bruce.
translation.zh: 我做不到另一件事 那就当一个好的布鲁斯吧

translation.en: Kris, will you have Bruce to be your husband?
translation.zh: 克莉丝 你愿意让布鲁斯成为你的丈夫吗？

translation.en: Will you pledge yourself to him, in all love and honor?
translation.zh: 你愿意以爱和荣誉之名向他发誓吗？

translation.en: I will.
translation.zh: 我愿意

translation.en: [photographer] Here we go. One, two, three, smile!
translation.zh: 来吧 一、二、三 微笑！

translation.en: Bruce, smile!
translation.zh: 布鲁斯 笑一个！

translation.en: Here it is.
translation.zh: 在这里

translation.en: A romantic kiss for my beautiful, pregnant wife… -[laughs] -…on our property.
translation.zh: 在我们家 和我怀了孕的娇妻浪漫地亲吻

translation.en: -Okay, ready? -Where we'll spend the rest of our lives. This is it. Mmm. Okay.
translation.zh: 好的 你准备好了吗？就这样 好的

translation.en: Here comes our kids. They're so excited about the first day of school.
translation.zh: 孩子们来了 她们对开学第一天非常兴奋

translation.en: -Here they come. -[Kris laughs]
translation.zh: 她们来了

translation.en: [Bruce] We'll go with Khloé first.
translation.zh: 我们先从克洛伊开始

translation.en: Now, Khloé, I know you're so excited about your first day of school.
translation.zh: 克洛伊 我知道你上学第一天很兴奋

translation.en: Uniform girl. Here's Kimberly. Yes…
translation.zh: 制服女孩 这是金伯利 是的…

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I loved being a dad. I loved carpooling kids.
translation.zh: 我喜欢当一名父亲 我喜欢接孩子

translation.en: I loved giving 'em advice and bringing all these kids up.
translation.zh: 我喜欢给她们建议 带着孩子们长大

translation.en: The first thing on the calendar is the puppet show.
translation.zh: 日程上的第一件事是木偶戏

translation.en: …two, three, go!
translation.zh: 跳！

translation.en: [Kris] Hi, Kylie!
translation.zh: 嗨 凯莉！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] But the issue is not going away.
translation.zh: 但问题不会消失

translation.en: Whatever happens, I always want you to know that Daddy loves you,
translation.zh: 不管发生什么 我都想让你知道 爸爸爱你

translation.en: and I think you're a wonderful little girl.
translation.zh: 我觉得你是个很棒的小女孩

translation.en: And could I have a kiss?
translation.zh: 能亲一下我吗？

translation.en: We're still recording. Okay.
translation.zh: 我们还在录像 好

translation.en: Now, what do we have to say?
translation.zh: 现在 我们要说什么？

translation.en: We have to say, "Hi, everybody, it's Christmas 1997!"
translation.zh: 我们要说：“嗨 大家好 现在是1997年的圣诞节”

translation.en: Oh my gosh, she's going so fast!
translation.zh: 我的天 她滑得真快！

translation.en: She's going so fast!
translation.zh: 她滑得太快了！

translation.en: -[child screams] -[Bruce] Yeah!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I was experimenting a lot.
translation.zh: 我做了很多尝试

translation.en: [Caitlyn] And I thought, "Maybe I can survive
translation.zh: 我想：“也许我能在做布鲁斯的同时

translation.en: by just cross-dressing behind closed doors and still keep the old Bruce around."
translation.zh: 我想：“也许我能在做布鲁斯的同时 以私下穿女装的方式熬过去” 比赛开始时 我在这里遇到了所有詹纳家的孩子

translation.en: Here at the start of the race, we got all the Jenner kids here.
translation.zh: 比赛开始时 我在这里遇到了所有詹纳家的孩子

translation.en: [woman] Brody's here?
translation.zh: 布洛迪来了？

translation.en: I remember one time I was at the Marriott in Orlando, Florida.
translation.zh: 我记得有一次 在佛罗里达州奥兰多的万豪酒店

translation.en: All I had to do all day is give one one-hour presentation.
translation.zh: 我只需要做一个一小时的演讲

translation.en: I had the rest of the time to myself.
translation.zh: 剩下的时间自由支配

translation.en: And I thought, "I can sneak out, get in the car, just drive around."
translation.zh: 我想：“好吧 我可以溜出去 开车四处兜风”

translation.en: Just that little bit of freedom.
translation.zh: 就那么一点点自由

translation.en: Drove around for an hour and came back,
translation.zh: 兜风一小时之后回来

translation.en: and I'm walking through the lobby towards the elevator…
translation.zh: 我穿过大厅 走向电梯…

translation.en: and kinda going by the bar,
translation.zh: 路过吧台的时候

translation.en: and this guy comes running up to me,
translation.zh: 有个人突然跑到我面前

translation.en: says, "I love trans women."
translation.zh: 说：“我爱跨性别女人”

translation.en: Ran down the hall, slammed the door.
translation.zh: 我跑过大厅 关上大门

translation.en: My heart was pounding, and I was scared to death.
translation.zh: 我的心跳得飞快 我怕得要死

translation.en: And I'm thinking, "That was so close to getting caught."
translation.zh: 我心想：“差点就露馅了”

translation.en: [Caitlyn] But I learned I was very comfortable that way.
translation.zh: 但我知道了我那样很舒服

translation.en: Thank you very much!
translation.zh: 非常感谢！

translation.en: -[Caitlyn] But then the show… -[theme song plays]
translation.zh: 但之后的真人秀…

translation.en: It was an immediate, immediate change.
translation.zh: 那是一个突如其来的改变

translation.en: [Caitlyn] The world was different now.
translation.zh: 现在的世界不一样了

translation.en: It was just difficult, because I had so many secrets,
translation.zh: 当时太困难了 因为我有那么多秘密

translation.en: and I'm sneaking around, trying to live a little bit of my life.
translation.zh: 而我在偷偷溜出去 试着过一点我的真实人生

translation.en: First, it's official. Bruce and Kris have separated after 22 years of marriage.
translation.zh: 首先 布鲁斯和克莉丝 在结婚22年后正式分居

translation.en: -Not "aww." You mean, "Good for Bruce." -[laughter]
translation.zh: 不应该“唉” 你们应该说：“对布鲁斯是好事”

translation.en: [man] Bruce, are you happy to be single and free again?
translation.zh: 布鲁斯 你重获自由身开心吗？

translation.en: [Caitlyn] When Kris and I went our separate directions,
translation.zh: 当克莉丝和我分道扬镳时

translation.en: I decided, "I can't take it any longer. I'm going to do this."
translation.zh: 我决定：“我无法再忍受了 我要去变性”

translation.en: [man] Hey, Bruce, are you dating Ronda?
translation.zh: 嘿 布鲁斯 你在和朗达约会吗？

translation.en: [Caitlyn] I started to have some surgeries,
translation.zh: 我开始做一些手术

translation.en: but I wanted to keep that kind of quiet,
translation.zh: 但我希望低调行事

translation.en: because I never talked to any of my kids about these issues.
translation.zh: 因为我从未和任何一个孩子 聊过这些问题

translation.en: And then I'd come out of a doctor's office in a back alley
translation.zh: 然后我在做完一个气管切开手术之后

translation.en: uh, where I had a little tracheotomy, had the thing done.
translation.zh: 从医生办公室的后巷出来

translation.en: And there was a picture that…
translation.zh: 而TMZ要曝光

translation.en: that TMZ was gonna print.
translation.zh: 当时拍到的一张图片

translation.en: We broke a big story on the website
translation.zh: 我们在网站上爆了一个猛料

translation.en: that Bruce Jenner has gone to a Beverly Hills plastic surgeon
translation.zh: 布鲁斯詹纳去找了一个比佛利山庄的 整形外科医生

translation.en: to ditch his Adam's apple.
translation.zh: 摘掉了他的喉结

translation.en: [man] Hey, Bruce, did you get a surgery? Any comments on that?
translation.zh: 布鲁斯 你做了个手术吗？ 有什么想说的吗？

translation.en: [man 2] Do you want people not to talk about your gender reassignment
translation.zh: 你是否希望人们不再议论你的变性

translation.en: and tell your daughters to keep it on the down-low?
translation.zh: 并让你的女儿们对此保持低调？

translation.en: [man 3] Kendall, are you upset about your dad's sex change?
translation.zh: 肯达尔 你对你爸爸变性感到难过吗？

translation.en: [Caitlyn] My kids are seeing all of this…
translation.zh: 我的孩子们看到了这一切…

translation.en: and I still hadn't told them what was going on.
translation.zh: 而我还没告诉她们发生了什么

translation.en: And that, to me, is the worst part of that time in my life. You know?
